thread.title: Marvel Teases New Old Man Logan Team Series
thread.title_full: Marvel Teases New Old Man Logan Team Series

author: Jamie Lovett
title: Marvel Teases New Old Man Logan Team Series
text:
Marvel Teases New Old Man Logan Team Series Jamie Lovett Back to Article Image of 
ResurrXion kicks off this month for the X-Men in X-Men: Prime , but it looks like Marvel isn’t done revealing new X-Men titles. 
The Marvel Entertainment Twitter account revealed a cryptic new image that teases another ResurrXion X-Men title. This book includes Old Man Logan , Archangel, and at least three or so other mystery characters. 
Marvel does not name the new series, instead teasing that it is “The comic series fans have been demanding!” The series is set to debut in June 2017, meaning we won’t have too long to wait for a full reveal as June solicitations will be announced by the end of March. 
Old Man Logan is already featured heavily in the X-Men’s ResurrXion lineup. In addition to continuing his solo adventures in Old Man Logan with a new creative team, Logan is a member of Kitty Pryde’s flagship X-Men team in X-Men: Gold and leads an ad hoc team of mutants being hunted down in Weapon X . Up Next: The Near-Death And ResurrXion Of The X-Men 
Weapon X has been billed as the gritty X-Men book of the new relaunch but Marvel has insisted that it is not an X-Force book operating under another name despite former X-Force members Domino and Warpath being part of Logan’s group. Perhaps X-Force is what this new book is. Archangel was part of Logan’s X-Force team previously and, with the excitement building over X-Force possibly getting its own movie, it seems likely that fans have been asking Marvel to add an X-Force title ResurrXion lineup. 
If that’s the case, it's easy to speculate that some other former X-Force team members may be joining the group. The silhouetted character in the top left of the image seems to be holding a rather large gun, suggesting it could be X-Force founder Cable, who is set to get his own solo series as part of ResurrXion and has been teased for and will appear in Deadpool 2 . 
There’s another gun silhouette in the hand of the character on the right side of the image, who is also wearing a full mask that covers his or her hair. This sounds like it could be Deadpool, but the gloves and what looks like an overcoat suggest it is Fantomex. Both characters were a part of Logan’s previous X-Force squad. 
The rest of the silhouette is much hard to make out as characters, and possibly a vehicle, seem to be overlapping, but we’re forced to make a guess, we’d say Wolverine (X-23), Psylocke and Marrow are likely contenders. 
Check out the full image along with all of the other ResurrXion reveals in the gallery below.
